010package imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.linear;
011
012/**
013 * <p>
014 * This class represents a 2D shear transformation (as a special case of affine
015 * transformation). See Secs. 21.1.3 and 21.3.1 of [1] for details.
016 * </p>
017 * <p>
018 * [1] W. Burger, M.J. Burge, <em>Digital Image Processing &ndash; An
019 * Algorithmic Introduction</em>, 3rd ed, Springer (2022).
020 * </p>
021 * 
022 * @author WB
023 */
024public class Shear2D extends AffineMapping2D {
025        
026        /**
027         * Constructor Creates a shear transform.
028         * @param bx shear factor in x-direction
029         * @param by shear factor in y-direction
030         */
031        public Shear2D(double bx, double by) {
032                super( // calls constructor of AffineMapping
033                        1,  bx, 0,
034                        by, 1,  0);
035        }
036        
037        public Shear2D(Shear2D sh) {
038                super(sh);
039        }
040        
041        /**
042         * {@inheritDoc}
043         * @return a new shear mapping
044         */
045        @Override
046        public Shear2D duplicate() {
047                return new Shear2D(this);
048        }
049        
050}
051
052
